quote: Hiding from the camera is hiding from clients.
why_clipworthy: This statement challenges agents to rethink their approach to video marketing.
suggested_hook: Are you hiding from potential clients without realizing it?

quote: Your phone is a tool to make money.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to leverage their smartphones for business growth.
suggested_hook: Turn your phone into a money-making machine with this simple mindset shift.
